title: Workshop on Analytic and Computational Techniques in Spectral Theory and Related Topics
abstractText: The Workshop will bring together scientists who work on problems in the area of spectral theory and its applications to real world problems,to discuss open problems at the interface of analytic and computational methods. The workshop will focus on outstanding issues in Harmonic analysis,High contrast problems, Dynamical systems and non-linear problems and on questions at the interface of these topics.It will provide a forum for new interdisciplinary work and also provide a supportive environment for young scientists and research students to become involved in the activities.
impactText: workers in inverse problems for maxwell systems have used some of th ideas from harmonic analysis disused at the workshop Education,Electronics Cultural
findingsText: the importance of harmonies analysis in inverse problems some of the questions that were discussed could form the basis for further grant applications Aerospace, Defence and Marine,Education,Electronics
